document_data.name: Smokespire
document_data.mainbody: '''The Smokespire''' was an extinct volcano in the [[Troll Mountains (Amn)|Troll Mountains]] of [[Amn]] famed for being the home of the great [[dragon]] [[Balagos]]. It was the westernmost mountain in the range.
document_data.History: The Smokespire was once the home of [[Hulrundrar]] until Balagos slew her. In Tarsakh of [[1374 DR]], [[Daelegoth Orndeir]] led an assault on Balagos' lair to retrieve the ''[[Shard of the Sun]]'', a [[relic]] of [[Amaunator]] captured by Hulrundrar.<ref>
